text: Ham is pork that comes from a leg of a pig."Bacon: Bacon and Ham Curing" in Chambers's Encyclopædia. London: George Newnes, 1961, Vol. 2, p. 39. Ham can be dry-cured or wet-cured. Dry-cured ham is made by rubbing the meat with salt. Wet-cured ham is made with brine. Types of dry-cured ham: *Prosciutto crudo (Italian) *Prosciutto di Parma (Italian) *Jambon de bayonne (French) *Jamón serrano (Spanish) *Jamón iberico (Spanish) *Country ham (American) *York ham (English) *Westphalian ham (German) Ham is used in SPAM.How Do They Make Spam?. title: Ham
